= DataPipeline Formats =

The default formats handled by the program are shown below in the summery tree:

<img src=http://peat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Dataformats_overview.png width=800>

==Explanation of formats==

|| || *Description* || *Format* ||
||<img src=http://peat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pipeline_case1.png width=200>||Datasets per row with dataset names in header column||databyrow||
||<img src=http://peat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pipeline_case2.png width=200>||Datasets per column with dataset names in header row||databycolumn||
||<img src=http://peat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pipeline_case3.png width=200>||Datasets per row with multiple sets of dataset names in header columns||databyrow||
||<img src=http://peat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pipeline_case4.png width=200>||Datasets per column with multiple sets of dataset names in header rows||databycolumn||
||<img src=http://peat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pipeline_case5.png width=200>||Datasets per row in multiple groups with independent x-y values in columns||groupeddatabyrow||
||<img src=http://peat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pipeline_case6.png width=200>||Datasets per column in multiple groups with independent x-y values in rows||groupeddatabycolumn||
